it.ncorti.emgvisualizer.ui.fragments

Class ControlFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • it.ncorti.emgvisualizer.ui.fragments.ControlFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.widget.CompoundButton.OnCheckedChangeListener

    public class ControlFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.widget.CompoundButton.OnCheckedChangeListener
    Fragment for controlling sensors, allowing to connect and start raw data receiving
    Author:
    Nicola
